days.text: Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist in the morning. Force 3 to 4 east to southeasterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Mist at first. Force 2 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Mist in the morning and at night. A few showers. Force 2 to 4 south to southeasterly winds.
